questions.quote: Boy, I am really surprised at you.  You are the last person I figured would do something like this. I mean, George, yeah, I can see that. Even Jerry. But not you, Elaine...
Oh, Elaine, thanks for picking me up. I can explain everything.
Anyway, I called him back... I told him I had to go visit my father in the hospital in Maryland.
Vivian, hi it's Elaine. Yeah, I'm over at Jerry's, I got your message...What? Yeah, he's right here, hold on...
And you didn't ask me to do it? I could raise enough money to cure polio.
Why don't you just tell me the name of the movie you've selected.
So get this. I'm in the bathroom at work today, and I see Peggy using a seat protector.
When you're talking about a movie like "Beaches", moving from the chair to the couch , . . . that's quite a voyage.
Yeah. Have you noticed anything else that's different since the new management?
Hewwo and welcome to Movie phone. If you know the name of the movie you'd like to see, press one.
